title: Trump's Impeachment Trial Kicks Off with Arguments and Excuses | Kim Ghattas
itunes:title: Trump's Impeachment Trial Kicks Off with Arguments and Excuses | Kim Ghattas
description:
Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman reportedly hacks Jeff Bezos's phone, Congress members clash at President Trump's Senate trial, and Kim Ghattas discusses "Black Wave."
